item.title: Pok√©mon TCG Pocket Advance Ticket Finally Has A Use After One Year
item.content:encoded:
Chances are, you‚Äôve had the Advance Ticket sitting idly in your Pok√©mon TCG Pocket inventory for the best part of a year. The mysterious item has left everyone confused, but not anymore.

It‚Äôs been 12 months since Pok√©mon TCG Pocket launched. The free-to-play card-collecting and pack-opening feast has provided daily joy, and this is thanks to numerous new card sets, features, and fun battling. Something more Unown than the Pok√©mon itself is the Advance Ticket‚Äîwhich is about to be redeemed.

Advance Ticket Purposes Revealed For Pok√©mon TCG Pocket

A random draw is set to take place very soon, which will see very Pokemon TCG Pocket users with an Advanced Ticket be rewarded for their patience with a set number of Hourglasses.

‚ÄúWe‚Äôll be holding a drawing for players, so please make sure to check your Gifts in-game to see your rewards,‚Äù said the official X page.

The random draw will happen at 11 PM PDT on October 29, and the prizes are divided into three different potential outcomes:

  • 1st Prize: 1,200 Pack Hourglasses for 100 lucky winners.
  • 2nd Prize: 120 Pack Hourglasses for 10,000 lucky winners.
  • 3rd Prize: 24 Pack Hourglasses for all players.

Whatever the result, if you have the Advanced Ticket in your possession, you are guaranteed to get some Pack Hourglasses. Obviously, we‚Äôd all love to be the recipient of 2nd Prize, let alone 1st Prize.

Interestingly, according to the small print, even if you don‚Äôt have the Advance Ticket: ‚ÄúThe 3rd prize will also be distributed to players with no advance ticket.‚Äù

If you‚Äôve been waiting to see what the Advance Ticket does, do you feel it‚Äôs fair that players without it still get Packs? Or are you disappointed with the Advance Ticket reveal in general? Leave a comment, and then head over and join the Insider Gaming Discord Server.

Also, be sure to check out our complete Pok√©mon TCG Pocket B1 Mega Rising hub featuring details on its release date, start time, and which cards are being added in the new main set.

item.title: Do You Need Battlefield 6 To Play REDSEC? How To Play Battlefield REDSEC Battle Royale
item.content:encoded:
Battlefield REDSEC offers several new ways to play Battlefield 6. It arrived after Battlefield 6‚Äôs launch, just like Warzone did after MW 2019, and we‚Äôre here to let you know if you can play for free, and if so, how.

Battlefield 6 launched with a campaign and multiplayer. Throw in Portal, and you‚Äôve got yourself a pretty meaty bundle. However, we always knew EA and Battlefield Studios had more ideas up their sleeves. This materialized on October 28 with the launch of Battlefield 6‚Äôs REDSEC.

It came bundled with battle royale (no Solo mode, though) and the hot new Gauntlet playlist. Let‚Äôs see if you need Battlefield 6 to play it, though.

Can You Play REDSEC Without Owning Battlefield 6?

Yes, you can play Battlefield: REDSEC for free without needing to own a full, paid copy of Battlefield 6.

Just like Call of Duty and Warzone, REDSEC is an independent release separate from Battlefield 6. This means you can enjoy a premium Battlefield 6 experience without needing to pay a single penny. If you want to, you can buy Battlefield 6 from Amazon!

All BR modes are free-to-play, as is Gauntlet Mode. We‚Äôre sure REDSEC will add new features and modes over the coming months and years as well. Has there ever been a better time to be a Battlefield fan?

How To Play Battlefield REDSEC

To play Battlefield REDSEC, you need to go into your relevant storefront, download it, wait for it to install, and you can jump straight into EA‚Äôs free-to-play Battlefield experience.

For an easy breakdown of what to do, check out these simple instructions:

  1. Go to the PlayStation Store, Microsoft Store, or Steam.
  2. Search for Battlefield REDSEC.
  3. Click on the game.
  4. Choose to download Battlefield REDSEC.
  5. Wait for the download to complete.
  6. Once it‚Äôs ready, you can now boot up REDSEC and play it for free!

There was speculation that REDSEC was going to be free, but only for players who already own Battlefield 6‚Äîtechnically making it not free. However, this is a smart decision on EA‚Äôs part and should do a lot to help both Battlefield 6 and REDSEC have a long battery life.

Let us know if you‚Äôve had a chance to play REDSEC yet. Can you not get enough of Gauntlet? Or is the allure of battle royale still proving to be too much? Leave a comment and check out the Insider Gaming Discord Server.

We may earn affiliate commission if you purchase items through links on Insider Gaming. Read more about affiliate commission here.

We have more Battlefield 6 and REDSEC guides to read up on: How to Get A Free Battlefield 6 REDSEC Battle Royale Rogue Ops Pack, the Complete REDSEC DLC Trophy List, and How to Redeploy Teammates.

item.title: Today‚Äôs Wordle #1594: Hints And Answer For October 30, 2025
item.content:encoded:
Get ready for an easier Wordle answer than the past few days. Wordle challenges players to guess a fresh five-letter word each day in six tries or fewer. Whether you‚Äôre a beginner or a daily player, today‚Äôs tips and strategies can help you solve it faster and maintain your streak‚Äîif you‚Äôre open to a little extra help. So, if you‚Äôve found yourself stuck with today‚Äôs Wordle, don‚Äôt worry, you‚Äôll find some helpful hints and even the answer for Wordle Game #1594 for October 30, 2025.

To play today‚Äôs Wordle, head to the game‚Äôs website. If you want to go right to today‚Äôs answer without any tips or tricks, you can click right here. If you‚Äôve missed any days, check out our Wordle Answer Archive for every past answer.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today‚Äôs and yesterday‚Äôs editions of Wordle. If you don‚Äôt want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Wordle

Wordle is a simple but addictive word puzzle. Each day, players have to guess a five-letter word answer in no more than six attempts. After each guess:

  • Green letters are correct and in the right position.
  • Yellow letters are correct, but in the wrong position.
  • Gray letters are not in the word at all.

The goal is to guess the word in as few tries as possible. Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a popular online trend.

Wordle can only be played on the New York Times website. There is currently no app for you to download the official game.

Wordle Hints For Today, October 30, 2025

The Wordle answer for game #1594 ups the difficulty just a bit from Wednesday‚Äôs puzzle. According to the NY Times Wordle review, today‚Äôs answer takes an average of 4 guesses out of 6 to get. That means it‚Äôs slightly higher than the 3.8-guess average on October 29.

General Wordle Hints For October 30

Without giving today‚Äôs Wordle answer completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • Hint 1: The word contains two vowels.
  • Hint 2: It includes both L and H.
  • Hint 3: It‚Äôs a machine used in woodworking and metalworking.
  • Hint 4: It spins a piece of stock so you can shape it into bowls, spindles, or shafts.

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Wordle #1594 for October 30, 2025

Starter Words For October 30, 2025

If you want help getting started without having today‚Äôs Wordle answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you figure out some included letters. A few starter words that may help are:

  • EARTH
  • PLATE
  • ALERT

Today‚Äôs Wordle Answer For Game #1594 On October 30, 2025

If you‚Äôve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answer to today‚Äôs Wordle below.

Answer: LATHE

If you solved today‚Äôs Wordle without our answer, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow‚Äôs puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

Yesterday‚Äôs Wordle Answer

If you missed the previous game, here‚Äôs yesterday‚Äôs Wordle answer for Game #1593 on October 29, 2025:

Answer: GLARE

While not always the case, looking at previous words can sometimes give you insight into common patterns or letter usage in Wordle puzzles. Reminder, you can check out every past Wordle answer in our official archive.

When Is The Next Wordle Game After #1594?

Wordle games are updated daily at 12 am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before to give players a heads up. The game on October 31 will be Wordle Game #1595.

What Is Wordle?

Wordle is a daily word puzzle created by Josh Wardle. Initially developed as a prototype in 2013, it wasn‚Äôt fully released until 2021. The game tasks players with guessing a five-letter word in six tries or fewer, using hints from each attempt to narrow down the answer. Its straightforward concept, accessibility, and the thrill of solving a new puzzle each day helped it surge in popularity by late 2021. The success of Wordle inspired numerous spin-offs and social media challenges, leading to its acquisition by The New York Times in early 2022.

Need more help with other daily games? Let us know what games you‚Äôd like tips and clues for in the comments below, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

item.title: Pok√©mon TCG Pocket B1 Mega Rising‚ÄîRelease Date & Start Time, Confirmed Cards List
item.content:encoded:
Pok√©mon TCG Pocket is in the midst of its one-year anniversary celebrations, and a new set is right around the corner in Mega Rising, for which we have all the release date and start time details.

New sets in Pok√©mon TCG Pocket have been a regular occurrence since the title first released, but Mega Rising is a big moment for the title as it introduces the mechanic of Mega Evolution, adding further complexity to deck building to consider.

For all the release details of the Mega Rising set, check out our guide below.

Pok√©mon TCG Pocket B1 Mega Rising Release Date

TCG Pocket‚Äôs B1 Mega Rising set will be released on Thursday, October 30, as confirmed by the trailer for the new set.

The launch of the set marks the start of the second year of Pok√©mon TCG Pocket with the start of ‚ÄòB‚Äô sets, though it‚Äôs not clear at this stage exactly how that will shake up the meta and what restrictions, if any, will be in place for cards.

There‚Äôs still time to get your hands on Pack Hourglasses ahead of the release of the set, and it‚Äôs worth taking every opportunity you can ahead of the release.

Pok√©mon TCG Pocket B1 Mega Rising Start Times

The B1 Mega Rising set will be available in the game from 11 PM PT on October 29, with a release on October 30 for the majority of the world.

The table below shows the exact release time and date for major time zones across the world.

Pok√©mon TCG Pocket B1 Mega Rising Confirmed Cards List

The Mega Rising set in Pok√©mon TCG Pocket is headlined by the introduction of Mega Evolutions, following the release of Pok√©mon Legends: Z-A and Mega Evolutions returning in the physical TCG.

Ahead of release, the full set list has been detailed by Serebii, featuring Mega Pinsir, Mega Blaziken, Mega Gyarados, and Mega Altaria amongst the cards. In total, there are 331 cards in the set‚Äîbroken down into 226 normal cards and 105 Secret Rares.

The set will be split into three booster packs, like Genetic Apex was in the initial release of the game.

What Pok√©mon do you want to see added to Pok√©mon TCG Pocket? Let us know your thoughts in the Insider Gaming Forum.

For more Pok√©mon, read about the leak of a playable prototype for Pokopia, and check out all the details for Season 2 in Pok√©mon Legends: Z-A Ranked.
